name: Flock Leader
description:
Guide your flock of blobs to the goal that is located at the end of the map. The more blobs you have to control the harder it will be to guide them all safely because there are obstacles like spikes.

By clicking on the playing field your flock will move in that direction.

With the bottom left button you can change the formation of the flock. The formations are different forms like a long rectangle or a triangle form these are needed to open the doors.

Created under 48 hours for the Ludum Dare 40 Game Jam.

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/40/flock-leader
